dict.acceptation: 办公室；公职；（政府部门的）部；有特定用途的房间[建筑物]；

sent.orig: Office software is an example of office automation.
The third difficulty facing Windows and Office is security.
sent.trans: Windows和Office面临的第三大威胁是安全性。

sent.orig: Have good computer skills, be able to master OFFICE and CAD Went through National Programmer Test.
sent.trans: 良好的计算机技能，能熟练运用office办公软件及AUTOCAD等制图软件，通过国家程序员考试。

sent.orig: Microsoft Office applications and general computer skills.
sent.trans: 微软Office套件应用及基本的电脑技能。

sent.orig: To turn off the Help Agent (similar to Microsoft s Office Assistant) , deselect this option.
sent.trans: 要关闭帮助代理（类似于微软的Office助手），取消此选项。
